result.quote: A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: I am not a saint, unless you think of a saint as a sinner who keeps on trying.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: I learned that courage is not the absence of fear but the triumph over it.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: Like slavery and apartheid, poverty is not natural. It is man-made and it can be overcome and eradicated by the actions of human beings.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: May your choices reflect your hopes, not your fears.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: Only free men can negotiate; prisoners cannot enter into contracts. Your freedom and mine cannot be separated.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: Sometimes it falls upon a generation to be great. You can be that great generation.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: There is nothing like returing to a place that remains uncganged to find how you yourself have altered.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: There is nothing like returning to a place that remains unchanged to find the ways in which you yourself have altered.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: When a boat come upon a  winding river, slow down and the river becomes straight.
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: “And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same”
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: “As I have said, the first thing is to be honest with yourself. You can never have an impact on society if you have not changed yourself... Great peacemakers are all people of integrity, of honesty, but humility.”
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: “If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.”
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: “It is better to lead from behind and to put others in front, especially when you celebrate victory when nice things occur. You take the front line when there is danger. Then people will appreciate your leadership.”
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: “The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.”
result.author: Nelson Mandela

result.quote: “There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.”
result.author: Nelson Mandela
